StringTable.String: Shield systems are difficult and expensive to work with. We've made some progress at making them a bit cheaper to build, but more research will be necessary to get the most out of them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By simply turning up the firing rate of our point defense systems, we can increase their effectiveness, and the safety of our crews dramatically.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: There's only so much you can do to save weight on armoring - weight is very much a design feature. But some small changes to minimize overlap should help save a bit of weight without affecting the safety of our crews.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest shield systems provide far more protection then earlier deflectors, and are now capable of stopping incoming ordnance and beams rather than just deflecting them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: No expense is too great for the safety of our crews, and after much effort we've found a few ways to make our shield systems a bit stronger.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Shield systems are unfortunately quite expensive, and although we will not hesitate to spend money to protect our crews, there's no reason we can't try to make these systems a little more cost effective.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shield systems require very large field emitters to be effective. An unexpected breakthrough in our private sector has resulted in the creation of more compact models, leading to overall weight savings. Another victory achieved by Altarian ingenuity.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Barrier Fields will allow our shields to absorb a portion of the energy striking them, making our defenses far more energy efficient and resilient. Our ships and crews will now be much safer.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: After listening to some feedback from our ship's engineers, we made some changes to our Barrier Field systems to make the absorption capacitors work more efficiently. This should make a significant difference in shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: All of the components of our shield systems are now made in such quantities that we've been able to achieve a number of cost savings thanks to economies of scale.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest superconductors will allow us to build our shield systems with much smaller cooling systems, resulting in significant weight savings. Now our ships will be able to carry more equipment. Or just more shields.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: In our ongoing efforts to keep our crews safe, our researchers have developed a new type of shield that directs additional energy to the section of shields being impacted. This results in a far stronger, more versatile shield system.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've put so much effort into making our shields cheap that it's a little embarrassing. Altarians expect us to go to great expense to protect our crews, and now we simply can't.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shields are now as space and mass efficient as possible, the emitters pushing out as much energy as physics allows. Even Altarian ingenuity has limits it seems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest shields are as close to being invulnerable as possible, with only theoretical weapons capable of penetrating them. Our crews have never been safer.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have found a way to focus shield emitters at greater distances than before, allowing us to augment friendly shields across an entire fleet. Altaria's ships shall be stronger when working together.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Barrier Field systems can now be generated at enough of a distance that we can incorporate them into our fleet shield augmentation systems leading to even stronger reinforcement effects.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our finest minds have come up with even more enhancements for our shield augmentation modules. Additionally, a version of the same technology can now interfere with enemy shield systems. Only the most mindless species will dare confront Altaria now.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: If we build improved point defenses, our ships will be far safer against missile attacks. They won't protect much against other classes of weapons, so we'll need other measures to totally ensure crew safety.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles have fairly limited ways to evade incoming point defense fire, which should make it easier to learn and anticipate those evasions, making our point defense systems much more effective.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can find a way to reduce the cost of our point defenses, we can afford to install more of them, or spend those resources on some other form of defense.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Smaller railguns and projectiles are just as effective for point defense purposes, and will afford our ships significant weight savings they could use to install other defensive equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: Electronic counter measures will interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, increasing the survivability of our ships and crews. We don't want to send any more letters to crying parents than we have to.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest ECM systems are capable of randomizing their various defensive measures, making them more effective against incoming missiles.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to some efforts to standardize the circuitry and emitters in our ECM suites, we can now build them for far cheaper than before. Even on matters of self defense, there's no need to spend money wastefully.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By reducing the number of components in our ECM suites, and integrating many of their functions into smaller units, we can reduce their weight significantly, without compromising their effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our point defense systems out to constellations of drone platforms will ensure enemy missiles are intercepted long before they can threaten our crews.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've ordered our factory workers to stop becoming emotionally attached to the point defense drones, whom they'd been giving cute names. This should speed up production, and reduce any morale issues when those drones don't come back.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Refinements to our drone energy supplies and propulsion systems has allowed us to create smaller and more compact drones. Our ships shall be both safe and roomy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Aereon Drones are a fraction the size of conventional drones and just as effective, meaning we can now send a lot more of them out there. Our ships have never been safer from missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Long range missile tracking systems will allow point defense systems of an entire fleet to coordinate their fields of fire to better defend against incoming missiles.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: ECM coordination suites will allow point defense systems across a fleet to better coordinate their jamming activities, increasing missile security for all friendly ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleet-wide drone systems will fill the space around our fleets with effective point defenses. And our missile systems can now equip counter-counter-measures that will boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Thick plates of ultra-dense armor, however unsubtle, will provide significant protection to our ships. We don't have to over think this, as the primitive species certainly won't over think their attacks.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A team of engineers found a curing process which makes our armor panels somewhat more resilient. Their hard work will keep all Altarian crews a little bit safer.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufacturing armor is tough to do safely, simply because of the mass of everything involved. But now that we have a bit more experience working with these materials, we should be able to speed up production while still keeping our workers safe.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is always going to be heavy, and not even Altarian genius can get around that. But if we improve the fit and mounting systems, we should be able to cut down the weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: In our ongoing efforts to keep our crews safe, we've invented a composite which has incredible damage absorption potential, which we call Durantium. Our armor systems will now be much tougher.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Under extreme stress our armor plates were fracturing in very specific ways. We've found that by laminating them using a new technique, we can increase their durability a little bit.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We must always be careful of public perception when we try to save money on defensive systems; the Altarian people will not tolerate us putting their daughters and sons at risk. But if we frame this as making armor more cost-efficient, that should work.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our engineers have found a variation of the Durantium composite which is slightly lighter without affecting the armor's damage absorption potential.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor partially fluidizes upon impact, spreading the energy out over a much larger area. Not only is our armor more effective, it's capable of partially flowing back into shape after impact.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our most advanced armor systems had to be installed by highly specialized experts, which raised costs dramatically. We've finally been able to simplify and automate some of this process, which should lead to some cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A tweak to our Kanvium lamination process allows for the fluidization effect to work on marginally thinner armor plates. Our armor systems are now about as weight efficient as they can possibly be.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the genius of Altarian engineering, our newest armor is capable of tapping into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum. On impact, massive amounts of energy are directed outward to annihilate any incoming attacks.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain force fields are known to have a hardening effect, and by instigating those in powerful ship-based emitters, we're able to make every ship in a fleet substantially more durable. The aggressive species shall menace our fleets no longer.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: A cyclical and ongoing adjustment to our ship-based hardening fields appears to make them substantially more effective, making our fleets that much tougher and our crews that much safer.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now make armoring fields that induce the same fluidization properties of our Kanvium laminates, making every ship in an appropriately equipped fleet as close to invulnerable as we can make them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long known we're not alone in this galaxy. And if we hope to make the stars as peaceful as our own home, we must begin researching our communications technology immediately to begin a dialog with our new neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: After much hard work, and no small amount of brilliance, we've developed a Universal Translator which will allow us to communicate with the lesser species of this galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Not all aliens think as Altarians do, to their detriment. But if we try different rhetorical approaches when dealing with them we should still be able to improve their attitudes towards us.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian culture is so obviously superior to what alien civilizations have, that they'll surely open their hearts and minds to us if we can spread it to them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We are so sure and committed to our noble path that any advantages our philosophy offers us will arrive much faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians are a civil bunch, docile and easy to rule. But that's no reason we should be complacent, or stop searching for better ways to lead.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Federalist parties feature a weak central government with much of the power offloaded to regional Altarian governments. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist parties are designed to make our people happy and increase our diplomatic potential. This sometimes makes governments a bit less efficient, though happy Altarians are usually quick to forgive that.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people, a naturally balanced approach which appeals to most Altarians' sensibilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlike some other races in this galaxy, Altarians can be trusted with limited powers of self rule. By opening the government to the people in this way, we expect to see increased public satisfaction.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist parties maximize industrial capacity with a variety of rewards and incentives. It takes a great deal of finesse to ensure this doesn't negatively impact Altaria's famous quality of life. But we've managed, of course.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercantilist parties will boost Altarian strength via trade. The exposure our traders will have with other civilizations will also gives them a unique advantage at espionage, if we're willing to stoop to such a thing.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Technologists understand that by dedicating all of Altaria's effort and resources towards research, we will become as elevated a civilization in technology as we are spiritually.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An Interstellar Democracy provides the ultimate in accountability and transparency. Altarians can finally have a government worthy of them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's hard to deny the inferiority of some of our neighbors, much less ignore their violent tendencies. War parties are willing to engage with these obstinate fools and secure Altaria's destiny by whatever means are necessary.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A Pacifist party's dedication to promoting culture and social welfare can make Altarians so well liked in the galactic community that our very popularity ensures our safety.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space based governance, providing the ideal platform for Altaria to secure its position as the pinnacle civilization of sentient beings in this galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Talking with our neighbors will always be cheaper than fighting them. And we shouldn't deny them the blessing of hearing our advice on how to run their civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activity. These treaties should result in increased wealth for both Altaria and whoever we bless with our business.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A cultural treaty will make it easier for thoughts and ideas to cross borders, which will shine the light of Altaria on our less fortunate neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal research treaty will help both our and our neighbors' researchers do their work. Our neighbors are so fortunate to have us around.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: We must be careful allying ourselves with other races, as even the friendly ones can be surprisingly primitive in their dealings. Still, the benefits of friendly relations are too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal military alliance will make both Altaria and her ally that much more secure. The bullies and villains of the galaxy will learn to watch their step.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A technological alliance will dramatically increase both our and our ally's research programs. Finally our allies can benefit from Altarian ingenuity, and to a lesser extent, vice versa.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we lower barriers to the movement of civilians across borders with our neighbor, we can influence their thinking and affairs more than ever.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian voices carry far, and even our enemies know their best interests lie in listening to us. More advanced diplomatic buildings will make this easier than ever.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of our neighbors have long seen the light of Altarian prophecy. Our emissaries to their planets are treated as near gods themselves, and many beg us to become part of the Altarian republic.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets is a crude venue for diplomatic discussions, filled with lesser minds. But there's always value in open discourse, and with our talent for diplomacy, we'll now have extra votes to make use of there.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: It took very little to convince our allies to align their United Planets voting with us. They can see the benefit of the Altarian path as well as anyone.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: No-one understands the benefits of culture better than Altarians, and any open-minded race who samples ours will soon see why. But for those that need a little help, we can start dumbing things down for them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our diplomats, along with serving as Altaria's voice, can also serve as advertisements for the Altarian way of life. If we can make them better cultural ambassadors, we can spread our influence wider.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians love their art, and have no problem spending resources on it. But that's no excuse for spending wastefully. With a bit of effort, we should be able to build our cultural facilities a little more economically.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we're going to be spending a lot of resources on our cultural facilities - and Altarians will certainly demand we do - we should ensure these facilities can be maintained as economically as possible.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: Facilities that reach out to our neighbors, helping to make our art and thinking more accessible and digestible to them, will help spread the light of Altarian culture further. If they don't like it, we shall teach them to like it.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We could make several small tweaks to our cultural products to make them more appealing to scientists and researchers. More math jokes and the like.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which celebrates leadership and good governance sounds deathly boring, but it will help spread Altaria's influence on planets with high approval. And really, who doesn't like good governance?

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems a bit tacky to celebrate wealth when so many in the galaxy go without. But if we adjust our culture to celebrate some of the tasteless things money can buy, we can spread our influence on planets with wealthy populations.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Considering all our civilization offers, it's only natural for the lesser races to look up to us. If we make the process of emigration easier, Altarians will shine our light on the galaxy, increasing our influence greatly.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of the people who arrive in Altarian space cling to their old, inferior traditions. If we can remove the attachments they have to their old, backwards cultures, we can increase the acceptance of our own that much more.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: The Altarian standard of living is now obviously the superior choice for sentient beings in this galaxy. All sane beings dream of becoming Altarian, to join us as we march on to our destiny.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: The destiny of the Altarian people lies not in this universe, but the next. Our greatest minds are already making preparations for delivering our glorious civilization to these higher planes.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing Altarians to take their private enterprises into space will require careful regulation lest they begin inefficiently using resources that could be better used for the public good. But the potential a strong economy offers can't be ignored.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing private enterprise to build their own wealth is a troubling idea for many of our people, going against much of what we stand for. But the boost to our economy should indirectly benefit Altarians everywhere.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Redirecting our economic policy to support workers and generally improve the work/life balance will please Altarians throughout our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we increase the amount with which we trade with our neighbors, we'll not only profit more, but tie them that much closer to us and our destiny.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: We're dealing with far more complicated and involved markets than ever before. Revised regulations and economic buildings will be necessary to ensure Altarians can profit from this without sacrificing our quality of life.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Our private sector has grown at an alarming pace, leaving many Altarians frightened at what our civilization is becoming. A new generation of banks and regulations will be necessary to encourage this wealth to grow in a sustainable fashion.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: People throughout the galaxy appreciate Altarian goods, everything we touch seeming to be more valuable in their eyes. We should increase our trading efforts more to take advantage of everyone's envy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatness is so obviously destined for the Altarian people that we can now begin extracting favorable terms from our treaty partners.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we do everything we can to accommodate tourists, we can encourage more of them to travel here and learn our ways. As a side-effect, they might spend a bit more money while they're here.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Buildings dedicated to complicated financial machinations should help generate much additional wealth for our civilization. Which is hard to turn down, even if it is a little unseemly for an Altarian.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Galactic stock markets will make it easier than ever for Altarians to generate wealth. Altaria was always known for its enlightened people; and know it shall be known for its wealthy ones as well.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Trade is an excellent way to build friendly relations with neighbors. If they didn't love Altaria for our culture, they shall love us for our goods.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated trading hubs will encourage our traders and their partners to do more of their business here. Where it can be more easily taxed, and thus benefit all Altarians.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff stations on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've developed a taste for trading, the volume of goods passing through our ports has grown immensely. Enhanced facilities will be needed to ensure the money continues to flow into Altarian coffers.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Every lesser race in the galaxy knows that Altarian markets are the only place to move their goods, and the latest generation of trading buildings will increase our trading income more still.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEnjoymentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEnjoymentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Spending resources on public entertainment is something all Altarians approve of and even demand. What purpose could be higher than improving an Altarian's quality of life?

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: The rich and full lives that Altarians enjoy is the envy of the galaxy, and we've already begun luring visitors from our neighbors. Some increased tourism infrastructure can help encourage this.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianMeditationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Meditation Centers.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianMeditationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Meditation Centers will give Altarians a quiet place to reflect on their lives, the nature of the galaxy, and our rightful place in it, greatly boosting a planet's approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPlanetaryRefection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Communion Centers.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPlanetaryRefection_Dec
StringTable.String: Communion Centers are designed to allow Altarians to come together in an environment conducive to finding common ground. The serenity these places offer should greatly boost a planet's approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianSerenityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Drathian Temple.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianSerenityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drathian Temple and the Shrine of the Mithrilar are designed to spread Altarian wisdom and enlightenment across the galaxy. Any planet blessed with such a gift will see its approval rise immensely.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging both Altarians and our friendly neighbors to travel the tame stars within Altarian space should greatly increase our tourism revenue, while showing off all the Altarian civilization has to offer.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPrecursorAntiquities_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Precursor Reliquary.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPrecursorAntiquities_Dec
StringTable.String: So wealthy are we with the wisdom of the Precursors, that we're able to sell smaller relics to tourists and other enlightenment seekers, providing a very valuable source of tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy has long known how incredible Altaria is. We've made a point of telling them actually. And now our latest, most incredible tourist destinations will begin attracting even more visitors to our glorious home.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Altaria is the font from which all goodness in the galaxy flows. There isn't a civilized being in the galaxy that doesn't dream of one day visiting us. We can now become a mandatory destination for every sentient being.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our industry off world turned out to be far more dangerous than we anticipated, and we slowed everything down until we were confident the work could be done safely. But now that we've analyzed things, we've spotted a number of ways we can begin specializing our industry.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: As the Altarian civilization expands, we will find ourselves in a near constant state of construction. We should ensure our construction practices are as efficient as possible.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Specializing our manufacturing processes will allow us to boost the capacity of specific sectors, or even to save money we could use to improve our people's lives in some other way

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are now famed throughout the galaxy for their industry, and yet even at this advanced stage, they're unwilling to rest. There are still some improvements left to make.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPrecursorHistory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let the wisdom of the Precursors improve our society.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPrecursorHistory_Dec
StringTable.String: By better understanding the history of the Precursors, we can begin taking steps to make our race even greater than it already is.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian researchers are of course geniuses, but in their exuberance to keep pushing back the veil of darkness, they've developed a number of inefficient practices. We should correct some of those now.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we specialize our research facilities, we'll be able to accelerate the pace of findings in the fields most important to securing Altaria's future.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians are intelligent and adaptable enough to make ideal colonists, and now have the free time to dedicate their energies to improving specific aspects of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Various aspects of our agricultural sector appear ripe for optimization, which, if implemented, should lead to much more efficient farms.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: It should come as no surprise that our civilization became master farmers; our peaceful and nurturing disposition is without peer in this galaxy. And yet still a few more improvements can be made to our agricultural industry.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our colonial structures to suit the environment, and to a lesser extent, vice-versa, we should be able to make our colonies operate more harmoniously and efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people should never have to suffer, even on an extreme world. We must do everything we can to ensure the quality of life of every Altarian, no matter where they live.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the latest technology, even the deadliest and most toxic worlds need no longer inflict such a harsh toll on the Altarians who live there.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we want to continue sending ships further and further from the safety of Altaria, we should begin improving our equipment and navigational techniques immediately.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians never settle for good, and now that our engineers have had a chance to work with our Ion Drive systems for a bit, they've identified a number of ways to make them even better.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warp field technology is incredibly complicated, but that just means there's lots of room for improvement. Our finest minds have already come up with some promising leads.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian ships are already the best in the galaxy and yet still our engineers spend hours looking for ways to wring even more power from their engines.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Sensor systems are so often overlooked in favor of more glamorous technologies that it's highly likely we will be able to improve upon them with only a minimal amount of effort.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our ship's engineers have begun reporting back that there are a number of different ways we could begin improving our field detectors.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered sensor technology like few other races. But that's no reason to give up yet. A few more improvements should still be possible.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've observed the impact that Precursor relics have on our society, we can coax Altarians to react to them in very specific ways.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: It's an easy sell to the budgetary oversight committee when we promise we're working to optimize our life support systems. Everyone wants the best for our crews.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Field-based life support systems are powerful, but still a little messy. Some tweaks to their design and operation could make them far more efficient and pleasant to use.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We shall spare no expense in building the best possible life support systems in the galaxy. Few races care for their crews like we do. Even now, our researchers work to improve these systems a bit more.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Building things in orbit is proving to be extremely challenging. Some more research is needed to identify areas of improvement and begin addressing them.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Expanding the scale of our micro gravity construction has proven to be a challenging but rewarding exercise. And recently, our construction managers have found a few ways we can begin building even more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The state of the Altarian ship-building industry has never been better, our engineers continually finding ways to improve our large scale construction techniques.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altaria's ships already dominate the galactic playing field, and still our engineers find ways to make them better.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we're going to risk Altarian pilots in fighter combat situations, we should ensure our carrier systems are as refined and efficient as possible.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Waste is never acceptable, but especially not in the depths of space. We should dedicate some research effort to finding new ways to improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we're going to divert resources to weapon systems for self-defensive purposes, we'll benefit if we focus our research efforts on a specific class of weapon.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the hard work of our engineers in the material sciences, our next generation of beam weapons should be much more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: However powerful our beam weapons are becoming, there are still a number of inefficiencies in them that can be improved upon.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altaria has, to the dismay of the aggressive species, become masters at using beam weapons. And still, despite our edge, we will not rest in our efforts to make them a bit better.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After much work at the test range, which they promise they didn't enjoy, our weapons engineers have discovered a few ways we can improve our missiles systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers promise that they haven't just been blowing stuff up for fun, and that they've in fact found a number of ways we could improve our missile warheads.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: It's a little dismaying to see how excitable our weapons researchers are getting. To enjoy using such destructive tools seems very un-Altarian. Still, their exuberance should lead to even more improvements in our self-defensive capabilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: However vicious they are, if we're going to use them, we should at least make sure to use them properly. More research on kinetic weapons could result in any number of possible improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our kinetic weapons are becoming incredibly dangerous, and the aggressor species of the galaxy now know we are not a race to be trifled with. We should continue improving our kinetic weapons to maintain our self-defensive capabilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians are masters of the kinetic weapon, and few species are foolish enough to menace our ships now. Let's continue our research efforts to ensure it stays that way.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: How we manage our military will be an important factor in how effective it is. Even if we're reluctant to use it, it should still be usable.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Even if we never intend to use them, we will be a more credible player on the galactic stage if we are capable of using advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces, although we should resolve to never use these weapons unless absolutely necessary.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't childishly assume every species in the galaxy will be as civilized as us. We must prepare our ground forces to defend against unconventional invasion tactics right away.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at building defensive systems left much room for improvement. For the sake of our crews, we have to do better.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's to make them stronger, cheaper, or lighter, there are a number of ways we can begin improving our shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of our Barrier Field systems has revealed that we're dramatically underutilizing their potential. We should begin improving them immediately.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our dedicated efforts to master shield technology, Altarian crews are now incredibly safe. Though that's no reason to rest; our shield systems can still get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our point defense systems are still quite primitive, with much room for improvement. For the sake of our crews, we must continue making these systems better.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ECM suites are already incredibly effective, but this is only the first step. These systems can still be improved in a number of ways.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems provide incredible protection against missile attacks. But no system is perfect, and our engineers believe we can still find cost or weight savings in these systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should spare no expense when it comes to the protection of our crews, and immediately look for ways to improve upon our existing armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Advanced computer modelling is capable of modelling armor behavior under impact, which should let our engineers see ways to improve upon the design of these systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We've done excellent work protecting our crews to date, but can't assume the violent beings that menace us will halt their own weapons research. We must continue improving our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should think very carefully about how we present ourselves to our neighbors. Studying their comically backwards ways of thinking should be the first step.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should choose how we organize our government very carefully, to ensure the welfare and safety of all Altarians.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As our glorious civilization grows, a number of new methods of governmental organization have become practical. We should choose among them very carefully.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We are masters of civilized debate and rational thinking, and all of Altaria benefits for it. So great is our powers of self-control that the most advanced political footings are now available to us.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should ensure that the treaties we enter in to benefit our people in the maximum possible way. They should settle for nothing less.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There are different types of alliance which we should become familiar with. Depending on the limitations of the species we're allying ourselves with, some of these may be more appropriate than others.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian culture is so obviously the pinnacle of what civilized beings are capable of, that we should do everything we can to ensure its spread throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: It's often the case that our culture, however fine it is, doesn't penetrate as far as it should, the small minded people of the galaxy distracted by their small minded concerns. But some specific modifications may help us target these challenging audiences.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Targeted programs can help boost specific sectors of the Altarian economy, delivering wealth and benefit to where it's needed most.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A more refined understanding of the complexities of galactic markets will allow us to boost specific sectors of our economy, ensuring Altaria's strategic needs are met by its growing economy.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our traders are already masters of wringing profits from the simpler races of this galaxy, but with a little more effort, we can make their trade routes even more lucrative by targeting specific markets.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: So trusted are Altarian traders that we can now begin creating trade routes that traffic in the materials needed to aid strategic goals of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are so naturally filled with approval of our leadership, that manipulating their attitude feels a little crude. But in those rare cases where approval dips, it would be prudent to have available certain techniques to get the people back on our side.
